job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout MeterltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtMeter is developing nextgeneration volumetric imaging technology We are building a machine that can see inside of anything and cloudbased software for processing the complex volumetric data that the machine produces Our technology will give engineers designers and eventually medical practitioners more confidence in their processes and lower the barrier to high quality imaging and inspection toolsltbrgtltbrgtOur team of engineers includes worldclass researchers industrial designers PhDs founders of successful startups and zero egos We are backed by some of the top venture capital funds and angel investors in Silicon Valley and beyond The company is headquartered in Cambridge MA and has an office in San Francisco CAltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWork closely with Meters hardware team to develop cutting edge software systems Systemsthinking and the ability to evaluate a problem from multiple perspectives is a must We are developing customerfacing software grounded in an innovative technology stack This role will involve understanding data flow through a complex hardwaresoftware system characterizing and optimizing performance of different parts of the system rapidly prototyping potential solutions and always keeping the customer in mindltbrgtltbrgtIf you are interested in joining a well funded growth stage company this is the perfect opportunity for you to become a part of the Meter team This role can be located in either Meters San Francisco or Boston office You may be required to travel occasionally between the two officesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe JobltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtBuild a software product from the ground upltligtltligtWork with an interdisciplinary team on a complex hardwaresoftware problemltligtltligtImplement stateoftheart algorithms for 3D imagevolume reconstructionltligtltligtInform the technical development of a fast moving software productltligtltligtRapidly iterate on prototypes and build production softwareltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtYoultbrgtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtHave designed and implemented software throughout its lifecycle taking a product from napkin sketches through shipping and maintenanceltligtltligtHave a strong grounding in computer science fundamentals ltligtltligtAre able to communicate complex technical problems to peers from different backgroundsltligtltligtAre comfortable prototyping and building high performance web apps with ReactAngularltligtltligtHave worked with AWS services S3 EC2 ECS Azure or GCP familiar with Docker KubernetesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtBonus points for ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtExperience with computational imaging image processing and 3D graphicsdata voxels meshesltligtltligtFamiliarity with scientific computing in PythonC ltligtltligtFamiliarity with GPU programming CUDA ltligtltligtExperience working in manufacturing industrial inspection or medical imagingltligtltligtA portfolio of your past work you can shareltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtLIMETERltbrgtltbrgtMeter offers both competitive cash and equity compensation We have a generous vacation policy as well as paid parental leave health dental vision retirement and commuter benefitsltbrgtltbrgtIn keeping with our beliefs and goals no employee or applicant will face discrimination or harassment based on race color ancestry national origin religion age gender marital domestic partner status sexual orientation gender identity disability status or veteran status Above and beyond discrimination or harassment based on protected categories Meter also strives to prevent other subtler forms of inappropriate behavior from ever gaining a foothold in our company Whether blatant or hidden barriers to success have no place at MeterltbrgtltbrgtReach out if you want to be a part of what we are buildingltbrgtltbrgtSan Francisco Applicants Review the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance guidelines applicable in your area
